author: BBC News
title: Ukraine: France seizes Russian ship over sanctions
description: The Russian-flagged cargo ship is suspected of breaching sanctions imposed because of the Ukraine war.
content:
Image caption, The Baltic Leader ship is being held in Boulogne
French sea police have impounded a Russian-flagged cargo ship suspected of breaching sanctions imposed because of the Ukraine war.
